title: Swiggy customer uses AI to fake damaged eggs, secures refund; viral post sparks debate
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming everyday life, but it is also opening doors to new kinds of misuse. A recent viral post on X by @kapilansh_twt highlighted exactly that, after a Swiggy Instamart customer allegedly used AI to generate the image of a damaged product and claim a refund.

title: Italy broadens antitrust probe into Meta over AI tools in WhatsApp
description: MILAN (Reuters) -Italy's antitrust authority said on Wednesday it had broadened the scope of its investigation into Meta Platforms over allegations the company abused its dominant position through the use of its artificial intelligence tools on messaging service WhatsApp.

title: HCLTech, SAP expand partnership to advance real
description: HCL Technologies is expanding its collaboration with SAP to develop Physical AI solutions, embedding artificial intelligence into real-world industrial and business operations. The partnership will focus on customer projects applying embodied AI to enhance productivity and decision-making in manufacturing, supply chain, and logistics. This initiative aims to drive intelligent automation and deliver measurable value through advanced AI applications.

title: Google, the sleeping giant in global AI race, now ‘fully awake’
description: Since the launch of ChatGPT three years ago, analysts and technologists — even a Google engineer and the company’s former chief executive officer — have declared Google behind in the high-stakes race to develop artificial intelligence. Not anymore.
content:

title: Asian Stocks Climb Amid Positive Economic Signals and AI Investments
description: China and Hong Kong stock markets witnessed an upward trend supported by Wall Street's positive performance and Alibaba's commitment to expand investments in artificial intelligence. China's CSI300 Index rose by 0.6%, reflecting optimism towards the potential December interest rate cut by the U.S. Federal Reserve.
content: China and Hong Kong's stock markets closed mostly higher on Wednesday, bolstered by the overnight rally in Wall Street and Alibaba's pledge to significantly invest in artificial intelligence. The CSI300 Index advanced by 0.6%, while the Shanghai Comp... [786 chars]

title: 'Are you insane?': Billionaire CEO Jensen Huang explodes at Nvidia managers in all-hands meeting. Here's why
description: At a time when tech industry is heavily dependent on Artificial Intelligence, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has endorsed the use of AI again. In an all-hands meeting, billionaire CEO exploded at managers of Nvidia who are reportedly asking their staff to reduce AI use. Nvidia isn't alone as tech companies stress the importance of AI adoption for employees.

title: HP to cut thousands more jobs in AI drive
description: The computer maker, which laid off staff in February, will lose up to another 6,000 people globally by 2028 as it increasingly adopts artificial intelligence
content:
Demand for AI-enabled PCs has continued to build externally, reaching over 30 per cent of HP’s shipments in its fourth quarter to the end of October.
A global memory chip price surge brought on by rising demand from data centres could push up costs a... [1042 chars]

title: SoftBank’s 40% slide from peak shows worry over giant OpenAI bet
description: Growing unease over frothy artificial intelligence valuations is weighing on shares of SoftBank Group, which traders increasingly view as a proxy for privately held OpenAI.
